description: Detects the use of NirCmd tool for command execution, which could be the result of legitimate administrative activity
name: NirCmd Tool Execution
query: ((winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"NirCmd.exe" OR process.command_line:(*\ execmd\ * OR *.exe\ script\ * OR *.exe\ shexec\ * OR *\ runinteractive\ *)) OR (process.command_line:(*\ exec\ * OR *\ exec2\ *) AND process.command_line:(*\ show\ * OR *\ hide\ *)))
author: Florian Roth
Nasreddine Bencherchali @nas_bench
